solution_line_template: There are {total_pounds_fish} pounds / {pounds_per_crate} pounds/crate = <<{total_pounds_fish}/{pounds_per_crate}={num_crates}>>{num_crates} crates of fish needed.
Hence, the total cost for the shipment is ${cost_per_crate}/crate x {num_crates} crates = $<<{cost_per_crate}*{num_crates}={total_shipping_cost}>>{total_shipping_cost}.
